PRICE NOW REDUCED TO £17500

We have reluctantly decided to put the bus up for sale due to impending house sale and subsequent loss of storage. The main details are listed below along with links to pictures of restoration before and after.

EXTERIOR

• Totally restored and repainted in April 2010 in original White over Turkis colours. Many thanks to Kev and Shaun at http://www.voodoopaint.co.uk for a top quality job.
• Bus is a Californian rust free import. Was supplied by Kieft en Klok to previous owner.Has safari windows and six pop outs
• All new Wolfsburg West seals throughout
• Bumpers restored and repainted, new chrome handles
• Brand new Empi 5 graphite grey alloys with polished rims, new tyres 185/65/15 rear and 175/55/15 front
• Lowered and 4” narrowed beam, although 1” spacers have had to be used to accommodate alloys. The alloys could be machined to remedy this, may be able to arrange this for prospective buyers. Goes over speed humps no problem
• Brakes overhauled including new pipe-work, brake cylinders and brake shoes all round (drum brakes all round)
• Ooogaahhh horn, always raises a smile!
• Totally solid underneath.

INTERIOR

• Full width rock and roll bed, creative engineering three quarter bench seat on bulk head
• Vinyl turkis/white new upholstery with 4” foam by Spirit Interiors
• Original roof lining, excellent condition, just one small 1” tear which has been secured so it will not get any worse
• New over head locker
• 240v hook up with consumer unit and two double sockets installed
• Leisure battery and dual charging system
• Stereo with new Kenwood door speakers. Triple cigarette socket for auxiliary equipment
• Door cards professionally recovered with wadding for a quality finish
• Dash (uncut) and all interior metal repainted including original steering wheel at same time as re-spray
• Speedo stripped and cleaned, chrome ring polished so looks brand new. New fuel gauge, everything works as it should

ENGINE/RUNNING GEAR

• 1914cc engine built by previous owner with the help of John Mayer Racing, with deep sump and external oil filter. Total oil capacity is 6ltrs
• Engine only done 5000 miles to date
• Twin 40 Weber carbs, electronic fuel pump and fuel regulator/filter
• IRS conversion
• Full service just carried out including oil/filter, plugs leads etc. Electronic ignition
• Engine pulls like a train, including uphill!! Recently completed a 1000 mile tour of Devon with absolutely no problems, very reliable

All in all a very well sorted bus ready to go wants for absolutely nothing.

Will be sold with 12 months MOT/tax (exempt) and for the right deal will include brand new roof rack and 240v/12v LCD TV/DVD combo (very handy to keep little ones occupied on the long runs).

Looking for offers in the region of £18500.
Please send message or call 07792 189180 for any other information. Serious enquiries only please, thank you for looking, Shaun.


For pics please click on these links:

http://s765.photobucket.com/albums/xx29 ... 0finished/

http://s765.photobucket.com/albums/xx29 ... storation/

Thanks again

Hi there,yes, bus is still for sale. forgot to add in the advert that the bus has safaris and six pop out windows. price now reduced to £17500 firm, which i believe is a very reasonable price considering the amount of money spent on the restoration. The engine cost around £4500 alone.A trouble free bargain for somebody on here.
Thanks, Shaun
